attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The last ten years have seen a period of economic and social stabilty unmatched in the lifetimes of anyone alive in these islands. Foreign policy has not always been trouble free, but at least the UK has a clearly defined view of the rest of the world, one that is probably more correct than mistaken.
With regard to Europe the government's policy is an evolving and progressive process, the best of which is yet to come.
Finally, there is no indication that what should be the ultimate arbiter in deciding who leads the nation, the people, want a change of Prime Minister.
